title: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: Comprehensive 5-day bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Hands-on projects and real-world applications.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and basic machine learning concepts in this 3-day intensive workshop.

title: IoT and Embedded Systems
description: Hands-on workshop on Arduino, Raspberry Pi, sensors, and building IoT applications. Create your own smart devices.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Learn to build cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart. Build and deploy your first app.

title: Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking
description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles, ethical hacking techniques, penetration testing, and security best practices.

title: CAD/CAM and 3D Modeling
description: Master AutoCAD, SolidWorks, and CATIA for mechanical design. Learn 3D modeling, assembly, and engineering drawing.

title: MATLAB for Engineers
description: Comprehensive MATLAB training covering programming, data analysis, visualization, and Simulink for engineering applications.

title: PCB Design and Prototyping
description: Learn PCB design using EagleCAD and KiCAD. Hands-on experience in designing, simulating, and fabricating PCBs.

title: Digital Marketing and SEO
description: Learn digital marketing strategies, SEO, social media marketing, content marketing, and Google Analytics.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Introduction to cloud computing concepts, AWS services, EC2, S3, Lambda, and deploying applications on cloud.
